title: Girl gamers or noobs come learn with me!
body: Before I say anything, I'm not saying that girl gamers are noobs, just that I never played lol with girl gamers before and I think they're pretty cool ppl to play the game with. Onto topic, I'm kinda in that part of the game where you're trying to find something new to do. I coach ppl for solo que as a part time job but this is completely free! If you think you need to improve on the game, stuck in elo hell etc.... I can sure as hell get u out. And no I will not elo boost anyone. Any girl gamers wanting to come hang and chat are also welcome =). Hopefully you'll all be comfortable with using skype. No trolls please.

replies.body: i want to become a better rumble and yasuo player, pls help

I tried adding you but it said your friends list is full. I have the most games in the region with rumble, and although im only silver5 (currently =[) have faced a manner of all elo's from bronze to high plat. If you want some help with rumble gimme an add.
Just add me on lol so I can spectate ur games

OH PHEW
I thought u said dat Girls were Noobs... (Have mercy mum)
ANYWAY, if you want to play with chicks on LoL, ask in game :P
haha I would... but I don't have any added or anything

I'm Sure **Durenga **would be happy to help :)

(don't tell her I sent you, she is tryhard and I blame everything on her, I mean everything)

(P.S. I blame her for losing and winning lanes alike)

(P.S. don't let her flirt, its bad for her)

(P.S. don't let her say mean, its bad for her)

(P.S. why am I telling you this, I'm not her handler just ask to friend her)
What do I say then. It's be weird if some random person added and u don't know why
I am paper 40 noob would like coaching

Sure if you want some coaching just add me on lol


Qwertyuiopman
Im just more or less after tips and what im doing wrong in games I generally go well but I seem to make general mistakes that prevent me from carrying myself into silver, {{champion:32}}
sure if u have time add me on lol and we can discuss
